title: Big Box Reuse
name: Big Box Reuse
description:
A Map by Tracy_the_astonishing

The WalMart moved into the Super WalMart half a mile up the road. The big box stood empty for a few years. No other retail stores would be given a lease for the building. What can a community do with an empty big box and a couple acres of parking lot? Check out the Places on this map to find out.

Most of these Places come from Julia Christensen'e Big Box project. If you know of a big box being reused for something in your community, add it to the map!

properties.name: Blue Ridge Church
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing    The Blue Ridge Community Church is in a building that was originally a Food Lion grocery store in Lynchburg, VA. Before the church moved in, the building was also used by the Salvation Army. (click url for more info)

properties.name: Bragg Blvd. Flea Market
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing   The flea market is in a renovated K-Mart. The flea market has lived in the building for many years longer than the K-Mart had been there prior to their abandonment of the building. The renovation on this building was minimal. Even the original sign has merely been painted over. In the picture below, you can see the neon "BASICS" detail of the original K-Mart sign. (click url for more info)

properties.name: Grace Fellowship Church
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing     Grace Fellowship Church is a non-denominational congregation. The church contains a 1500 seat sanctuary, over 15 classrooms, 2 cafes, a youth club, several meeting rooms and offices, and is home to several clubs and meetings. Grace Fellowship is in a renovated Grand Union Grocery Store. The Grand Union sat empty for 4 years before Grace Fellowship breathed their life into it. (click url for more info)

properties.name: Granby Street Apartments
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing   The Granby Street Apartments are located in a renovated Ames Department Store in Norfolk, VA. When Julia visited this building, she was under the impression that it was a renovated big box building, meaning a large, one-room, free-standing building. However, the Granby Street Apartments are a part of a downtown revitalization project that is happening in Norfolk, and the Ames Department store is actually an older building with many levels and many rooms. (click url for more info)

properties.name: Head Start
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing   The Head Start Family Resource Center in Hastings, Nebraska is in a renovated K-Mart. The building houses 13 classrooms, as well as 4 larger rooms for infants and toddlers, a parent room, a resource center for people who have recently immigrated to the US, computer labs, cafeterias, conference rooms and offices. The building has large outdoor playgrounds, opening up to the cornfields of Nebraska. (click url for more info)

properties.name: Jen Library
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing    The Jen Library at the Savannah College of Art and Design is certainly one of the most exquisite libraries on any college campus throughout the South. In fact, Savannah is certainly one of the most exquisite towns in the South, so it is no surprise that this art school\'s library, which resides in a renovated department store, should be as artfully designed and aesthetically pleasing as the surrounding homes and shops. (click url for more info)

properties.name: Lakewood Church
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing   Although there have been countless occasions upon which I have thought, read, or even said out loud, "There is a church in Houston in a renovated basketball stadium," it very honestly did not even begin to sink in until I actually visited the place. Lakewood Church in Houston, Texas is indeed in the abandoned Summit Stadium at Greenway Plaza, former home of the Rockets.

properties.name: Medical Center
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing    The Central Kentucky Comprehensive Medical Center resides in a renovated Wal-Mart. It is privately owned by a group of 4 doctors, who funded the million dollar renovation in order to create this giant medical complex.

properties.name: Nelson County Justice Center
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing  This building was the original inspiration for the entire project about renovated big box buildings. Although it is not actually a renovated big box itself, it is the building that sparked Julia\'s interest. The town courthouse in Bardstown, Kentucky, Julia\'s hometown, is sitting where a Wal-Mart building sat---once upon a time as a functioning Wal-Mart, then as a vacant building for many, many years. Wal-Mart built a Super Wal-Mart across town, and the structure at this location was abandoned. (click url for more info)

properties.name: New Calvary Chapel
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing  When Wal-Mart abandoned the building across the street to build a Super Wal-Mart a quarter mile down the road, church-members kind of looked at each other and chuckled, thinking, "What if....?" Well, the idea shifted from a joking comment to an idea that actually made a lot of sense, and they made a bid. They found out that they were actually up against a much higher bidder, but this high bidder had various zoning stipulations built into their offer. As a result of this, the Calvary Chapel won out. (click url for more info)

properties.name: Old Calvary Chapel
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing  The Calvary Chapel of Pinellas Park, FL, near St.Petersburg, has been residing in an old Winn-Dixie grocery store for the last 7 years. They moved into the space with a congregation of roughly 700 people, and today they have a congregation of over 2000 adults and 600 children. (click url for more info)

properties.name: Princeton Fitness and Wellness Center
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing       The Princeton Fitness and Wellness Center has been open in a renovated Grand Union grocery store since May 19, 2003. The size of the building is 52,000 square feet, and is one of 4 facilities that the company owns, the largest being a 94,000 square foot building that is a renovated Ames department store. (click url for more info)

properties.name: RPM Indoor Raceway
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing   The RPM Indoor Raceway, most unfortunately, closed its doors recently. The fact that the raceway closed is quite remarkable actually. The renovation itself was wonderful, and the use for the space was fantastic. When you walked in the raceway, you could imagine yourself saying, "What would it be fun to do in a huge, empty Wal-Mart building?" Driving small cars around it really fast is pretty good answer. (click url for more info)

properties.name: Snowy Range Academy
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing  Renovated Wal-Mart. The Snowy Range Academy is a charter school in Laramie, WY. The charter was approved by the Albany County School Board on December 12, 2001. The school is in a renovated Wal-Mart. The Wal-Mart was abandoned in approximately 1997, and was renovated in the summer of 2002 for the Academy. Julia is going to be visiting this site again for further documentation in the summer of 2005. (Click url for more info)

properties.name: Spam Museum
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing     The museum is in a renovated K-Mart building. The renovation on this building has barely left a trace of the original use. In fact, the actual shell of the structure is all that is left of the old K-Mart. Windows, doors, walls, ceilings, and the entire exterior have all been completely overhauled. (click url for more info)

properties.name: Sugar Creek School
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing   Renovated K-Mart. The renovation of a big box building is a major undertaking. Although the buildings are easily adaptable, usually with fairly new electrical and structural elements, the fact of the matter remains: big box buildings are very, very big. The process of taking a roughly 100,000 square foot room, breaking it into several smaller room and hallways, and getting the building ready for a drastically different use is a major project that involves major money and time. (click url for more info)

properties.name: The Guitar Center
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing  The Guitar Center is a major national chain that sells guitars, keyboards, drums, other musical instruments, and a mass amount of gear and accesories for musicians of all types. This branch of the Guitar Center chain is in a renovated Home Depot. Major big box retailers rarely sell or lease their abandoned buildings to other major national retailers, avoiding competion in the surrounding retail market.
